title: Routine Updates
desc: PixelPlusUI keeps you updated with routine updates for security patches and other features.

title: Great Support
desc: User friendly developers always ready to help you out with your issues everytime you jump in support group.

title: Customizable
desc: We provide useful customisation based on your requests, but this doesn't mean we can provide all the customisation available on the planet.

title: Revamped UI
desc: Unlike other ROMs, we provide something new to our users with this new UI inspired by different android based skins present in market.

title: Fast & Smooth
desc: PixelPlusUI is well optimized for better smoothness and fast performance for every device.

title: Better Device Support
desc: With increasing number of developers our official list of devices is also increasing. Keep checking the list to find yours.
